flawed_nl_solution:
Charles drew 6 + 6 = <<6+6=11>>11 pictures.
He has 20 - 11 = <<20-11=9>>9 papers left.
So Charles drew when he came back from work 9 - 2 = <<9-2=7>>7 pictures.
#### 7

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 11. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
